alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:02PM MST until February 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Wet and slushy surfaces are anticipated to freeze up overnight. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
